result.execSummary:
The defendant Marques D Collons was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes:
Conditions apply to all counts.
Probation review hearing December 2, 2016 at 1:30 p.m. in  Br. 24.

miscConds.notes:
Provide DNA sample.
EACH COUNT: Pay the DNA & DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 
-Court WAIVED all other court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay.

- No contact with firearms.
- Court advised that under 48 USC Section 922(g)(9) the defendant is prohibited from possession of a firearm after conviction of a crime of domestic violence.

- No contact with Loraina H. and Christerle R. (DOB 10/16/1981) unless approved by the agent.
- Court grants third party contact, as approved by the agent, for purpose of time with the child.

- Batterers Intervention program.
- Parenting classes.
- Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.

- AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
- Absolute sobriety.

timeConds.notes:
(on count 1), STAYED pending review on August 26, 2016.
*8/26/2016  Order for Commitment signed/filed.  To serve three (3) days straight time, forthwith.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marques D Collons

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Brian Burke.  Porchia Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant or mostly compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is not needed.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Brian Burke.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Court admonished defendant for non-compliance and ordered defendant to serve 3 days of the condition time; straight time; forthwith.  Commitment For Condition Time For Non-Compliance With Probation Conditions - Domestic Violence Court signed and filed.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for December 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Defendant Marques D Collons in custody.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. State complied with victim notification. Sentencing Proceeded. State played two CD recordings on the record, which are to be filed. Statements by parties and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1
The court sentenced the defendant to 90 DAYS in the House of Correction, consecutive, with credit for 43 days time served, straight time.  Court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on PROBATION for 12 months.

AS TO COUNT 2 AMENDED
The court sentenced the defendant to 90 DAYS in the House of Correction, consecutive, straight time.  Court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on PROBATION for 12 months.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
-Serve 30 days (on count 1) in the House of Correction as Condition Time, STAYED pending review.
-Batterers Intervention program.
-Parenting classes.
-AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
-Absolute sobriety.
-Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.
-No contact with Loraina H. and Christerle R. (DOB 10/16/1981) unless approved by the agent. Court grants third party contact, as approved by the agent, for purpose of time with the child.
-Obtain/maintain employment.
-No contact with firearms.
-Pay the DNA & DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 
-Court WAIVED all other court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay.
-Provide DNA Sample.
-Restitution set at ZERO.

*Court advised that under 48 USC Section 922(g)(9) the defendant is prohibited from possession of a firearm after conviction of a crime of domestic violence.

Filed: 
-Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief
-Memorandum of Conditions of Probation

Probation Review Hearing in branch 24.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for August 26, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Marques D Collons not in court, in custody.  William P. Dockry appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defendant's appearance waived. Defense withdrew request to withdraw plea. Defense requests a Sentencing date. Discussion of bail placed on the record. Bail remains in effect. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Discharge Summary Report.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Marques D Collons not in court, in custody.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defendant's appearance waived. Defense requests an adjourned Status Conference. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Status Update Report.
Received and Filed, Letter on behalf of defendant.
TOT to Justice Point. All other conditions of bail remain.
Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court. Court ordered case adjourned for a Status of Counsel date in branch 24.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Statements made by Loraina H. Bail motion by the state argued and granted by the Court.  Bail $2,000.00 cash. TOT to Justice Point. All other conditions of bail remain.  Status conference scheduled for May 12, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Micha A. Schwab appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Case heard off the record.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed. Due to this court being trial, case adjourned for Sentencing. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for May 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Discussion of Justice Point violation placed on the record. Defendant motion for counsel to withdraw denied by the court. Case remains scheduled for Sentencing on 4/7/2016 at 8:30 am. Case adjourned to branch 24.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.
Per court order, case scheduled in branch 24 for Hearing to address violation report. Parties notified.
Received and Filed, Justice Point VIOLATION Report; Missed Office Contact.

Statements made by Loraina H. Victim impact statement received and filed.
AS TO BOTH COUNTS 1 & 2 (count 2 amended):
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties do not stipulate to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea. Based on the defendant's statements and from Defense counsel, court finds that a factual basis does exist for the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
Case adjourned in branch 24.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Jaclyn Schwartz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court ordered stayed warrant lifted. Case calendared for jury trial.  
AS TO COUNT 2:
On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to disorderly conduct, domestice abuse assessments, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes section(s) 947.01(1), a Class B misdeameanor.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for final pre-trial.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next date. Case adjourned in branch 24.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Received and Filed, State's Witness List.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Micha Schwab appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests an adjourned Final Pretrial date. Court grants defense request. Case remains scheduled for Jury Trial on 3/2/2016 at 8:30 am. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CJH dob 7/13/05; LLH dob 9/19/84 or CLR dob 10/16/81

Defendant Marques D Collons in court with Student Intern Solomon Gatton under the supervision of attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Defendant Marques D Collons in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
